page.title: 11PUBLIC SERVICES
page.content: The Post Office in Babcary is graded Grade II, and business is so low that it is due to close down sometime during July 1985. The only Bus Service available is in Babcary, and there are only two regular buses, both being school ones. One goes to Castle Cary and the other to Huish Episcopi. There is only one school that is in our area, and that is Hazlegrove House, a prep school. Although Hazlegrove has about two hundred and fifty boys at the moment, there are plans to greatly expand soon. There is only one church in our area and that is in Babcary. The church is called The Church of the Holy Cross, and is about five hundred years old although there has been a church on this site for over a thousand years.
